page.title: 14Government
page.content: Swainsthorpe, Swardeston, and Stoke Holy Cross have their own parish councils, Dunston being included with the latter. Parish councils have very limited powers but can levy a local rate for very small things. All the area falls within the area administered by the South Norfolk District Council. This deals with such matters as public health, refuse collection, building and planning, sanitary inspection and also rents out houses to people. Norfolk County Council administers the more major areas of health, education, highways and police, etc. The area is included in the South Norfolk Parliamentary constituency, the member for whom is Mr John McGregor, of the Conservative party.
